content.text:
Hey [@Lucas](@QTIAJ1macmjKZH+I2DoDM5mD+R0DTqLn5gORzo8aWes=.ed25519), did you end up getting `ssb-patchwork` installed? There was a bunch of work done to get Patchwork (and its dependencies) work with Node 10, and `ssb-patchwork` on the AUR was able to update a few days ago. Let me know if there's anything I can do to help out!

I have patchbay packaged as well, just haven't published to the AUR (yet (maybe)).
